name: Bubble Animals (remake)
description:
Pop all the bubbles

How to play

Tap on the screen to shoot a bubble.

Match three (or more) identically-colored bubble to pop them.

The game is over when the wall reaches the bottom of the screen.

Credits

Sprites by Snow Run Games,  Mike Dailly,  Rober Brooks,  aloknarula.

Music by Komiku.
